publishedfiledetails.title: Modern Lighting Pack - 2020 Edition
publishedfiledetails.file_description:
This pack adds 27 new street lights and lamps to your game. These props can be used for assets and can be placed ingame using Network Skins 2 and More Beautification.

Content as of May 2020:
[h1]+ Suspended Street Light
+ Suspended Avenue Light
+ Stainless Street Light
+ Stainless Avenue Light
+ LPS Street Light
+ LPS Avenue Light
+ Thylia Street Light
+ Thylia Avenue Light
+ Thylia Promenade Light
+ Swan Light S (New!)
+ Swan Light L (New!)
+ Retro Street Light
+ Retro Avenue Light
+ Utility Pole
+ Curved Street Light
+ Curved Avenue Light
+ Reflective Light Single
+ Reflective Light Double
+ Spiral Lamp
+ Light Column
+ Park Light
+ Park Light Yellow
+ Triple Lamp Post
+ Bollard
+ Ground Light
+ Spot Light
+ Spot Light Yellow[/h1]

[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1758376843]Network Skins 2[/url] can be used to apply any street light to any of your roads.
You can free-place these with the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=505480567]More Beautification[/url] mod.

Each prop is 200 to 500kb in size and has custom LODs and thumbnails. 

UPDATE NOTICE:
If you've been subscribed to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1826488681]Modern Lighting Pack: Liberated![/url] and resubscribe to these assets, existing lights in your cities will have to be replaced manually.

publishedfiledetails.title: Farm Fields Pack
publishedfiledetails.file_description:
[img=http://i.imgur.com/ZJGfn7P.jpg]



[h1][b]Farm Fields by DeCzaah[/b][/h1]



This is a pack with [b]28[/b], [b]ultra low poly[/b] (max. 50 tris!), terrain conform, farm field assets. 

- corn field, 16x4 (50 tris)
- corn field, 4x4
- corn field, end

- cotton field, 16x16 (10 tris)
- cotton field, 4x4
- cotton field, end

- rapé field, 16x4 (24 tris)
- rapé field, 4x4
- rapé field, end

- poppy field, 3x color variation, 16x4 (24 tris)
- poppy field, 3x color variation, 4x4
- poppy field, 3x color variation, end

- vegetable field, 16x4 (12 tris)
- vegetable field, 4x4

- vegetable field 2, 16x4 (12 tris)
- vegetable field 2, 4x4

- vegetable field 3, color version 1, 4x4 (12 tris)
- vegetable field 3, color version 2, 4x4 (12 tris)
- vegetable field 3, color version 3, 4x4 (12 tris)

- wheat field, 16x16 (30 tris)
- wheat field, 4x4
- wheat field, end

- wheat field cut, 16x16 (10 tris)
- wheat field cut, 4x4
- wheat field cut, end

- wheat field young, 16x16 (10 tris)
- wheat field young, 4x4
- wheat field young, end



required mods (ingame using, not only at the asset editor):
- „more beautification“ mod (to find and place the props ingame)

I also recommend a few more mods, for a perfect look and better placing like:
- „Dynamic Resolution“ (better AA, better look on distance)
- „Adaptive Prop Visibility Distance“ (better look on far away distance)
- „Move It!“ (better placing and moving)



[h1][b]FAQ:[/b]

Q: Is it functional?
A: No, it's only for optical, decorative, asthetic, visual purposes.

Q: Where can I find it?
A: You can find it with the „Find It!“-mod (type for example "field" to find it), or at the „Residential -> Garden“ category.

Q: It doesn't look as good as on the preview pictures. How to improve the quality and/or visibility?
A: Use other mods, like the recommended „Dynamic Resolution“, „Adaptive Prop Visibility Distance“, etc. Such mods also need much more performance and will likely let your FPS drop.

Q: Why does it disappear at specific camera positions?
A: It has to do with the optimization of the game. The game blend out props at specific angles and camera rotations to save on performance automatically. 

Q: It disappears when I zoom out far away!
A: Props work a bit different than „normal“ buildings, especially at render distance, LOD using, etc. Use „Adaptive Prop Visibility Distance“ and play around with the sliders. Such a mod also need much more performance and will likely let your FPS drop.

Q: Where you got the other assets on the pictures from?
A: I used decals by Ronyx69, the corn harvester by ale_donkey, hay bales by Beardmonkey, trees by Lost_Gecko and Archie Cuntingham's Tractor + Tank.
[/h1]

Q: Why are the big fields not that terrain conform?
A: Because of their size. The terrain conform shader has a limit, unfortunately. Try the small 4x4-versions, they are way more terrain conforming.



Special thanks to GiometryE for beta testing and Ronyx69 for the offset idea.



enjoy!

publishedfiledetails.title: Animated Waterfall
publishedfiledetails.file_description:
Let's get a feel for nature.
By using Procedural Objects to change the size, you can create a wider range of waterfalls.

Due to the AnimUV specification in the game, the waterfall stops in the distant view. By using the Ultimate Level Of Detail, you can make it look like it's moving even in the distant view.

[h1]Specifications[/h1]
1. Animated Waterfall Regular
2. Animated Waterfall Triangle
3. Animated Waterfall Tiny 
4. Animated Waterfall Riffles A
5. Animated Waterfall Riffles B

Type: 5 Props
Tris : Main(LOD) 2560(160)-40(20)
Textures: 1024x1024(256x256)

* Loading Screen Mod ready

[h1]About the production request [/h1]

I can accept asset request with commissions. You can request trains, buildings and props.
Please contact me on discord, twitter or steam for details. I don't accept unpaid asset request.

[h1]Donations[/h1]
If you like this work, please consider donating to me by the author.

*Steam Gift → kaminogi_works
*Amazon gift certificate → amazon-gift@kaminogi.jp
*Support on Youtube → https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCf4FNV0ZYHVV3IgYspBQKOA/join

publishedfiledetails.title: Curb Props 2
publishedfiledetails.file_description:
[h1][b]Curb Props 2[/b][/h1]

A set of planters for all your parking lots and landscaping needs. This is follow-up to the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=715367646][b]older Curb Props[/b][/url]. Which apparently a lot of people already have. Watch the attached video to see how these compare to when I first made them. I think that these fit in better with the game, they follow the terrain surface, and can be intersected with each other to create different shapes. 

There are 10 props overall which you can see in the attached images and video demonstration. They can be found under the Props>Common>Streets or searching "curb" or "planter"

Demonstration can be found here:
https://youtu.be/RV-8tKd8W1Q


If you like my assets, show some love on YouTube and please consider a small donation for support as a token of appreciation. 
[url=https://www.paypal.me/kingleno][img] https://www.paypal.com/en_US/i/btn/btn_donate_LG.gif[/img][/url] [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCb3XIy87a9owPB9zCcN-keA][img]http://i.imgur.com/28iTeHY.png[/img][/url]

publishedfiledetails.title: Hedges
publishedfiledetails.file_description:
A pack of hedge props and networks, also includes replacements for the vanilla hedge.

Search for "r69 hedge" using Find It!


If a network segment is too long, there might be a gap, simply split the segment into two by creating an intersection.


Main: 
350 - 974 tris
512x512

LOD: 
10 tris
64x64


Commission for Geze.


[url=http://twitch.tv/ronyx69]Twitch[/url]
[url=http://youtube.com/ronyx69]YouTube[/url]
[url=http://twitter.com/Ronyx69/]Twitter[/url]

publishedfiledetails.title: Curb Props
publishedfiledetails.file_description:
The first curb props I uploaded. They are nonconforming so they can be elevated. Includes curb/planters in 6 different sizes and shapes. Textures updated for 2018! 

Subscribe to my YouTube channel to see how I create assets. 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCb3XIy87a9owPB9zCcN-keA

If you like my assets, please consider buying me a beer or a cup of coffee (too keep me awake to make more assets!) by making small donation as a token of appreciation. 
[url=https://www.paypal.me/kingleno][img] https://www.paypal.com/en_US/i/btn/btn_donate_LG.gif[/img][/url]

publishedfiledetails.title: Pipes props pack
publishedfiledetails.file_description:
8 props for all your above ground pipe needs! They can be used to decorate assets or placed in your city with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=837734529]Find It[/url]. They work just fine on slopes (as long as they're not crazy steep).

For detailed stats see the last picture, but note that the one crossing the road is fairly high on tris count for a prop (860). Otherwise they're 118-302 tris with LODs being 36-140 tris.

[h3]Disclaimer[/h3]
For full transparency: I am an employee at Colossal Order, however this is my personal account and as such all opinions, content and contributions to the community reflect my own views and interests, and are not created nor maintained as part of my job. Like all user generated content, this is not officially supported content and should be used at your own risk.

[b]Questions, bugs & feedback[/b]
Please direct all questions regarding the game, official content and Colossal Order to the official channels: https://linktr.ee/colossalorder

publishedfiledetails.title: Park Tile Decals
publishedfiledetails.file_description:
a collection of tile decals using a combination of the vanilla tile texture, [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=555682532&searchtext=paved+]boformer's paving ground texture[/url], and a random brick texture from textures.com [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=555681732&searchtext=paved+]which also happens to be another of boformer's decals[/url] only lighter. 

1. 4m x 8m mixed striped texture
2. 4m x 4m checkerboard texture
3. 4m x 4m vanilla texture
4. square texture
5. inverted square texture
6. mixed texture
7. white marble 
8. concrete tile
9. brick herringbone
10. paved brick

If you like my assets, show some love on YouTube and please consider a small donation for support as a token of appreciation.
